text: Consider the following data path diagram. BUS TEMP1 . MAR MDR IR PC ! J» I . iaere “ To Memory Consider an instruction: R0 <— R1 + R2. The following steps are used to execute it over the given data path. Assume that PC is incremented appropriately. The subscripts and w indicate read and write operations, respectively. 1. R2,, TEMP1,, ALU,q4, TEMP2,, 2. R1,, TEMP1,, 3. PC,, MAR,,, MEM, 4. TEMP2,, RO, 5. MDR,, IR, Which one of the following is the correct order of execution of the above steps? A.2,1,4,5,3 B.1,2,4,3,5 C.3,5,2,1,4 D.3,5,1,2,4
